name: Shroom Blight
description:
Controls:

W, A, S, D: To move.

The Arrow Keys: To shoot.

(If you have a problem with not being able to click a combination of certain keys, that's your keyboard, not the game.)

‏‏‎ ‎

Description:

This is a small, game that I made over the course of 24 hours. It's just a mage fighting a magical blight of shrooms, in his garden.
